faqs.question: What is Pandora’s Finance and how does it work?
faqs.answer: It's a platform to invest in fractions of properties and startups: you register, get an access right, and participate in legally backed investment rounds.

faqs.question: How do I invest and how much do I need?
faqs.answer: Sign up, claim your access, and choose a project. The minimum varies per offer; you can pay in fiat or stablecoins depending on each project.

faqs.question: How do you protect my money?
faqs.answer: Funds are held in trust/escrow, operations are on smart contracts with multisig validation; the legal structure is detailed in each offer.

faqs.question: What returns can I expect and what are the risks?
faqs.answer: Returns depend on the project (rent, appreciation, sale). Risks include construction, market, regulatory, and liquidity. There are no guarantees.

faqs.question: When and how do I receive my return or can I exit?
faqs.answer: Payments follow the project's schedule (e.g., quarterly or at closing). Early exits may be allowed via a secondary market or transfers, subject to conditions and potential penalties.

welcome.title: Welcome to Pandora's Finance
welcome.content: These terms and conditions ('Terms of Use') govern the access to and use of our software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform and DApp, available at https://dapp.pandoras.finance/ (the 'Platform'), as well as the services for issuing Digital Artifacts and acquiring digital rights and utilities.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: Platform: Pandora's SaaS technological services and DApp.
Users: Individuals or legal entities ('Creators' or 'Community') who access and use the services.
Access Artifacts (NFTs): Unique digital assets (NFTs) that grant the holder access to utility protocols, benefits, or specific 'Creations'.
Utility Rights: Specific digital benefits, access, or functionalities linked to an Access Artifact or a protocol within the Platform.
Artifact Issuance: The process of creating and registering a unique digital asset (NFT) on the blockchain, which represents a specific utility defined by a 'Creator'.

usage.title: Platform Use
items: The Platform allows 'Creators' to design and launch utility protocols, and the 'Community' to obtain Access Artifacts (NFTs) that grant Utility Rights in selected 'Creations'.
Users must have a compatible digital wallet to interact with the Platform.

Pandora's operates as a technology platform (SaaS) and is not a financial, investment, or any other type of advisor. We do not offer guarantees on the value, liquidity, or future benefits of Digital Artifacts or Utility Rights.

responsibility.title: Liability and Disclaimer of Warranties
items: Pandora's is not responsible for the volatility, losses, risks, or value fluctuations of digital assets (like cryptocurrencies or Artifacts) used or acquired on the Platform.
The Platform operates on the blockchain, therefore all transactions are irreversible and cannot be modified once confirmed.

Users accept and understand that possessing an Access Artifact (NFT) only grants the utility rights or access specified in its 'Creation' (protocol), and does not confer ownership over the Pandora's company, its assets, or any underlying asset not explicitly defined in said protocol.
The Platform reserves the right to modify, update, or suspend any service without prior notice.

requirements.title: User Requirements
items: You must be 18 years or older to use the Platform.
You agree to comply with the tax and legal regulations of your country of residence.
Pandora's reserves the right to refuse access to any user if suspicious activity or violations of these Terms are detected.

payments.title: Payments and Service Fees
items: Service fee payments on the Platform are made exclusively in cryptocurrencies or via approved methods.
Pandora's, as a SaaS provider, charges fees for using the platform, issuing Artifacts, or interacting with protocols. These fees will be clearly communicated.
Due to the nature of the blockchain, all transactions (including service fee payments or Artifact acquisition) are final and irreversible. No refunds are offered.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Security
items: Personal data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
The user is responsible for the security of their digital wallet and private keys.
Pandora's is not responsible for unauthorized access resulting from the user's negligence in safeguarding their credentials.

law.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
items: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Mexico.
Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts in Mexico City, Mexico.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of the Terms of Use
acceptance.content: By using the platform, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy, agreeing to comply with them without reservation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Pandora's, we are committed to protecting our users' privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our Platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal information: Name, email (if provided voluntarily), digital wallet address.
Transaction information: History of platform interactions, Artifact 'minting', and blockchain movements associated with your wallet.
Technical data: IP address, browser type, cookie data.

usage.title: Use of Information
items: To process transactions and manage user accounts.
To improve the security and functionality of the Platform.
To send communications about service changes and updates.
To comply with applicable legal and KYC/AML regulations, if required.

protection.title: Information Protection
items: We implement technical and organizational security measures.
Information on the blockchain is public, immutable, and transparent.
We do not sell personal information to third parties without explicit consent.

rights.title: User Rights (Data Protection)
items: Access, modify, or delete your personal information (to the extent it is not on the blockchain).
Request the cancellation of your account (if applicable).
Opt-out of receiving promotional communications.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
items: We use cookies to improve the user experience.
Secure authentication and persistent session.
Behavioral and navigation analysis.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Due to the decentralized nature of blockchain technology, some data (like public transactions) may be processed and replicated globally. We ensure compliance with applicable data protection regulations.

changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via the Platform or email (if provided).

info_modal.title: About our Creations Hub
info_modal.paragraph1: Our Hub connects Creators with community members, offering a new way to participate in the digital economy. Here you don't just explore Artifacts: you access loyalty protocols, NFT memberships, and 'Work-to-Earn' (Labor) systems. Every Creation is managed with blockchain transparency, facilitating participation and rewards for work.
info_modal.paragraph2: With Pandora, participation is no longer passive: now you can build your community, activate it, and generate Rewards for real 'Labor'. Our platform guides you from start to finish: from designing your protocol to managing your Creations and Artifacts, all within a transparent, utility-based ecosystem designed to grow with your community.

section1.title: Take control of your community
section1.content: Select a category, review its 'Codex' (documentation), and begin your 'Forge' (creation) process in minutes. Each category comes with clear metrics so you can make design decisions with confidence.

section2.title: Transparency and continuous participation
section2.content: We offer a real-time monitoring system for 'Labor' (work) that guarantees the quality of each protocol. This way, your community grows, backed by data and total transparency.

about.title: About Pandora's Finance: Building the New Digital Utility

the_big_why.title: Our Big Why
the_big_why.p1: In a world where digital communities are fragmented and passive, thousands of creators struggle to activate their audiences. Apathy, the centralization of platforms (Web2), and the lack of tools prevent the majority from building real-value ecosystems.
the_big_why.p2: Pandora's Finance was born from a fundamental question: What if we could unleash that potential? What if we could make building a loyalty protocol or a 'Work-to-Earn' ('Labor') system as simple as creating a website?
the_big_why.p3: Our "big why" is creator sovereignty and community activation. We believe in a digital future where any 'Creator', from anywhere, can build their own utility protocols safely, transparently, and efficiently, all through the power of our platform.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.content: Our mission is to build and operate the most robust technological infrastructure (SaaS) to create Utility Protocols. We connect 'Creators' with their 'Communities', generating participation tools for the former and rewards for 'Labor' (work) for the latter. We do this through a no-code platform that guarantees security, transparency, and an exceptional user experience.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.intro: Pandora's Finance is an end-to-end 'no-code' SaaS platform. Our main focus is on Utility Protocols (Loyalty, Access, Work-to-Earn) for any type of digital community.

services.title: Audited Contract Templates
services.description: We provide pre-audited *smart contract* templates so that 'Creators' can launch their protocols securely.

services.title: No-Code Builder
services.description: An intuitive dashboard that allows any 'Creator' to configure, design, and deploy their 'Artifacts' without writing a single line of code.

services.title: Protocol and Community Management
services.description: Tools to monitor participation, manage rewards, and consult documentation to ensure the success of each 'Creation'.

our_current_position.title: Our Current Position
our_current_position.intro: We are not just an idea; we are a platform in active beta. As of today, Pandora's Finance has:
points: A functional and operational SaaS platform.
A solidly established legal and brand structure.
'Creators' on the waiting list ready to launch their 'Artifacts' on our platform.

the_team.title: The Team Behind Pandora's
the_team.intro: We have a management and operational team that covers all critical areas for success:

areas.title: Technology and Product (CTO, CPO, Developers)
areas.description: Experts in blockchain, *smart contracts*, and the development of secure and scalable SaaS platforms.

areas.title: SaaS Legal and Compliance (Legal Team)
areas.description: Specialists in software (SaaS) compliance, data protection, and the legal architecture of Web3 platforms.

areas.title: Community and Growth (CMO, Executives)
areas.description: A dedicated team to build our brand, attract new 'Creators', and manage our network of collaborators.

strategic_allies.title: Our Strategic Allies
strategic_allies.intro: We understand that trust is the cornerstone of Web3. Therefore, we have built an ecosystem of alliances with leaders in their respective fields to ensure maximum technological security:

categories.name: Blockchain Technology
categories.partners: We integrate decentralized oracles like Chainlink and payment gateways like Transak for seamless operation.

categories.name: Audit and Security
categories.partners: We collaborate with firms like CertiK and PeckShield for security audits of our platform, and we use secure contract libraries from OpenZeppelin.

categories.name: Data Security
categories.partners: We use market-leading user data encryption and protection services.

categories.name: SaaS and Legal Advisory
categories.partners: We are backed by firms expert in digital law, SaaS, and blockchain technology.

categories.name: Community and Guild Alliances
categories.partners: We are members of software associations and digital creator guilds to stay at the forefront of the communities we serve.

roadmap.title: Future Vision - Our Roadmap
roadmap.intro: We are in a phase of accelerated growth with a clear plan for the coming months.

timeline.description: We will launch our robust DApp, complete the first 'Artifact' launches from our initial 'Creators', and begin operating the first 'Labor' (Work-to-Earn) protocols.
We will expand to new creator communities in Guadalajara and Monterrey and launch our first "Pandoras Pro" pilot for complex 'Governance' (DAO) protocols.
